long_description: It's easy to get to the gym with the REI Balance Gym Bag. Its features make it a breeze to pack, and the sleek silhouette delivers a fun, athletic sense of style. Size and shaped to fit conveniently into gym lockers; designed with main access to be used while hanging in your locker. Single straight zipper provides quick and easy top-side access. Front flap compression system conveniently holds a yoga mat, or creates an easy jacket stash location. Separate compartment is vented and seam-sealed with waterproof fabric, providing a great place to stash stinky gym shoes or a damp bathing suit. Side bottle pocket fits 1 liter bottle. Back panel zippered pocket has fleece-lined slot pockets for quickly stowing phone, MP3 and small accessories. Interior zippered mesh pocket separates small clothing articles from main compartment. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides comfort and secure single-shoulder carry.
short_description: It's easy to get to the gym with the REI Balance Gym Bag. Its features make it a breeze to pack, and the sleek silhouette delivers a fun, athletic sense of style.
